definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: When taken orally, bisphosphonates are poorly absorbed and have low bioavailability.
sentences.chinese: 口服雙磷酸鹽的吸收率及生物利用度非常低。

sentences.english: We make superphosphate by reacting rock phosphate with sulphuric acid.
sentences.chinese: 我們使磷酸鹽岩同硫酸發生化學反應制造過磷酸鈣。

sentences.english: Medicines called bisphosphonates are an option to bring down calcium levels.
sentences.chinese: 雙磷酸鹽可用來降低鈣質含量。

sentences.english: The islands have few mineral deposits worth exploiting, except for high-grade phosphate.
sentences.chinese: 島內除了高磷酸鹽，能夠開採的資源很少。

sentences.english: Chemical feeding facility will be set for adding phosphate to drum.
sentences.chinese: 爐水加磷酸鹽處理，藥液加至汽包。

sentences.english: Products with high proportions of polyphosphates are called built detergents.
sentences.chinese: 含有大量聚磷酸鹽的產品被稱爲改進型清潔劑。

sentences.english: The organic matter in soil contains a small but fairly uniform proportion of phosphate.
sentences.chinese: 土壤有機質中含有少量的磷酸鹽，且其比例始終不變。

sentences.english: Bisphosphonates are popular and effective for treatment of osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 雙磷酸鹽對治療骨質疏鬆廣泛有效。

sentences.english: In the plant world glyphosate acts as a fake phosphate.
sentences.chinese: 在植物界中，草甘膦起到“僞磷酸鹽”作用。

sentences.english: New research published online in the FASEB Journal shows that high levels of phosphates may add more "pop" to sodas and processed foods than once thought.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲研究者發現高水平的磷酸鹽加速了衰老體徵。

sentences.english: Commercially viable phosphate deposits were exhausted at the time of independence.
sentences.chinese: 在獨立期間，可用於商業的磷酸鹽被消耗殆盡。

sentences.english: The optimizing hydration medium is phosphate buffer solution.
sentences.chinese: 最佳的水合介質是磷酸鹽緩衝液。

sentences.english: The whole machine is dealt with through phosphate antisepsis plastic spraying.
sentences.chinese: 整體機櫃通過磷酸鹽防腐噴塑處理。

sentences.english: The concentrations of usable elements in the Co-rich crusts have been changed by phosphatization.
sentences.chinese: 磷酸鹽化導致富鈷結殼成礦元素含量發生改變。

sentences.english: Also calculated was the boiler water pH value at the typical condition of equilibrium phosphate treatment (EPT).
sentences.chinese: 磷酸鹽處理是汽包鍋爐中占主導地位的爐水調節方式。

sentences.english: We developed a simulation of adherence to bisphosphonate therapy in the US.
sentences.chinese: 在美國我們制訂了一套堅持服用二磷酸鹽的治療方案。

definition: prefix or suffix of a compound word/affix (linguistics)
fired power plant (i.e. fired by coal, oil or gas)
saw palmetto (Serenoa repens, a small palm, an extract of whose fruit is used medicinally)
